title: Systematic Design of Mobile-Based Mathematics Online Learning Management Structure

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic arithmetic skills and experience using digital devices (required)
context.additional_context: Optimized mathematics learning content for smartphone environments, emphasizing practical approaches applicable to everyday problem-solving

learning_goals: Learners achieve ≥80% proficiency in weekly learning planning and execution using a smartphone-based LMS within 4 weeks
Learners improve standard algorithm problem-solving accuracy from 70% to 90% by the 3-month mark
Learners demonstrate the ability to adjust learning strategies through ≥3 peer/self-evaluations by course completion

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
